Description: Mapping of correct responses ("press 1 for words and 2 for non-words" or the other way around).
Unique identifier assigned to each participant.
Age of the participant at the time of the experiment.
Self-reported or observed gender identity of the participant.
Participant's self-reported educational area (available options: Art & Humanities / Natural sciences / Technical education)
Experimental list number ("word1" to "word4"). Items were distributed across 4 lists.
Presentation order within the session (0-indexed). The order in which the participant saw this trial.
Binary indicator of whether the participant's response was correct.

column3: depending on response_mapping for that participant and current target_word).

Description: Time taken by the participant to respond
Experimental condition assigned to the trial (could be a word or a pseudoword).
The target stimulus presented in that trial (could be a word or a pseudoword).
